title: The Secret to Mastering Aging
description:
Is it healthier to stand on principle and fight the good fight, or just let go and move on? Plus, Jillian addresses age-related wellness, and takes a call from a woman who discovered that the man she’d been dating is married.


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
